channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-1455|2024-09-16T19:25:00.237Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20application%20dependency%20discovery%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager 7.2.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 11029.
